fields_of_interest: General and Institutional Affairs, Agriculture, Budget, International co-operation and development, Energy, Environment, Maritime affairs and fisheries, Research and innovation, Trans-European Networks, Climate Action
eu_initiatives: MSFD, Habitats Directive, Birds Directive, EU Biodiversity Strategy, 7EAP, LIFE programme,  BISE, WISE, NNL, MAES, Green Infrastructure, CAP, CFP and other initatives that impact nature and biodiversity, CITES
section: VI - Organisations representing local, regional and municipal authorities, other public or mixed entities, etc.
subsection: Other public or mixed entities, created by law whose purpose is to act in the public interest
membership:
Network of Heads of European Nature Conservation Agencies (ENCA)  http://www.encanetwork.eu/ 
European Topic Centre on Biological Diversity  http://bd.eionet.europa.eu/

goals__remit: JNCC is the public body that advises the UK Government and devolved administrations on UK-wide and international nature conservation.
